data.event: As of 2014, the town included a complete school system (grades K-12), a post office, and a general store.

event.title: was born in La Junta in 1963

data.event: Rodeo star Lane Frost was born in La Junta in 1963 but spent his first days with his mother and grandparents in Kim, while his father was on tour.
Rodeo star Lane Frost was born in La Junta in 1963 but spent his first days with his mother and grandparents in Kim, while his father was on tour.
While daytime summer temperatures often exceed 90 degrees, nights are cool.

event.title: receives most of its precipitation in the spring and late summer

data.event: Kim receives most of its precipitation in the spring and late summer.
Snow falls several times each winter, but rarely exceeds a few inches.
